languages.text: "Мы не пойдем на мятеж. Но мы не дадим злодейски губить себя. Закон и Император за нас!" {n}Дева, тонкая и гибкая, как рапира, выступает вперед.{/n} "Если нас хотят согнуть страхом смерти — будем гибнуть, но докажем свою правоту!" {n}Звонкий призыв обращается приказом, впечатывается в сердца. Дурная вонь святотатства практически сбивает меня с ног.{/n}

"We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы не пойдем на мятеж. Но мы не дадим злодейски губить себя. Закон и Император за нас!" {n}Дева, тонкая и гибкая, как рапира, выступает вперед.{/n} "Если нас хотят согнуть страхом смерти — будем гибнуть, но докажем свою правоту!" {n}Звонкий призыв обращается приказом, впечатывается в сердца. Дурная вонь святотатства практически сбивает меня с ног.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We will not commit rebellion. But we will not let ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The Law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A maiden steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with fear of death, we may die, but we will prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

languages.text: "Wir werden uns nicht erheben, aber wir werden auch nicht zulassen, dass Schurken uns abschlachten. Das Gesetz und der Imperator sind auf unserer Seite!" {n}Eine junge Frau tritt vor, schlank und biegsam wie ein Rapier.{/n} "Wenn sie uns mit Todesangst zermalmen wollen, sollen sie uns töten. Das beweist nur, dass wir im Recht sind!" {n}Der laute Aufruf ist wie ein Befehl, der sich in ihre Herzen gräbt. Der faule Gestank dieses Sakrilegs lässt mich beinahe umsinken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden uns nicht erheben, aber wir werden auch nicht zulassen, dass Schurken uns abschlachten. Das Gesetz und der Imperator sind auf unserer Seite!" {n}Eine junge Frau tritt vor, schlank und biegsam wie ein Rapier.{/n} "Wenn sie uns mit Todesangst zermalmen wollen, sollen sie uns töten. Das beweist nur, dass wir im Recht sind!" {n}Der laute Aufruf ist wie ein Befehl, der sich in ihre Herzen gräbt. Der faule Gestank dieses Sakrilegs lässt mich beinahe umsinken.{/n}

languages.text: «No cometeremos ninguna rebelión, pero tampoco permitiremos que nos masacren los villanos. ¡La ley y el Emperador están de nuestra parte!». {n}Una mujer joven da un paso adelante, delgada y flexible, como un estoque.{/n} «Si quieren aplastarnos con el miedo a la muerte, que nos maten: ¡eso no hará más que demostrar que tenemos razón!». {n}Su resonante proclamación es una orden que trata de penetrar en sus corazones. El hedor del sacrilegio casi me derriba.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No cometeremos ninguna rebelión, pero tampoco permitiremos que nos masacren los villanos. ¡La ley y el Emperador están de nuestra parte!». {n}Una mujer joven da un paso adelante, delgada y flexible, como un estoque.{/n} «Si quieren aplastarnos con el miedo a la muerte, que nos maten: ¡eso no hará más que demostrar que tenemos razón!». {n}Su resonante proclamación es una orden que trata de penetrar en sus corazones. El hedor del sacrilegio casi me derriba.{/n}

languages.text: 「反乱は起こさないけれど、悪党に皆殺しにされるなんて嫌だわ。法と皇帝は私たちの味方よ！」{n}レイピアのように細身でしなやかな若い女が前に出る。{/n}「死の恐怖で私たちを踏み潰すというなら、殺させてやるわ。私達の正義の証明になるだけよ！」{n}響く叫び声は命令で、彼らの胸を掻き立てる。冒涜の悪臭に、足を踏み外しそうになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「反乱は起こさないけれど、悪党に皆殺しにされるなんて嫌だわ。法と皇帝は私たちの味方よ！」{n}レイピアのように細身でしなやかな若い女が前に出る。{/n}「死の恐怖で私たちを踏み潰すというなら、殺させてやるわ。私達の正義の証明になるだけよ！」{n}響く叫び声は命令で、彼らの胸を掻き立てる。冒涜の悪臭に、足を踏み外しそうになった。{/n}

languages.text: “我们不打算造反，但我们也绝不会任由恶人宰割！法律与帝皇都站在我们这边！”{n}一个年轻女人走了出来，苗条而柔软，仿佛一把刺剑。{/n}“既然他们打算用死亡来威胁我们，就让他们杀了我们吧！这只能证明我们的所作所为是正义的！”{n}她响亮的声音仿佛命令一般，压在所有人心里。她的话语中充斥着亵渎神明的恶臭，几乎要把我掀翻在地。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们不打算造反，但我们也绝不会任由恶人宰割！法律与帝皇都站在我们这边！”{n}一个年轻女人走了出来，苗条而柔软，仿佛一把刺剑。{/n}“既然他们打算用死亡来威胁我们，就让他们杀了我们吧！这只能证明我们的所作所为是正义的！”{n}她响亮的声音仿佛命令一般，压在所有人心里。她的话语中充斥着亵渎神明的恶臭，几乎要把我掀翻在地。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous ne nous rebellerons pas, mais nous ne nous laisserons pas non plus massacrer par des criminels. La loi et l'Empereur sont de notre côté ! » {n}Une jeune femme s'avance, fine et souple comme une rapière.{/n} « S'ils veulent nous écraser sous la peur de la mort, qu'ils nous tuent ! Cela ne fera que prouver la légitimité de notre combat ! » {n}L'appel résonne comme un ordre qui se faufile dans leurs cœurs. L'ignoble puanteur du sacrilège manque de me faire chanceler.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne nous rebellerons pas, mais nous ne nous laisserons pas non plus massacrer par des criminels. La loi et l'Empereur sont de notre côté ! » {n}Une jeune femme s'avance, fine et souple comme une rapière.{/n} « S'ils veulent nous écraser sous la peur de la mort, qu'ils nous tuent ! Cela ne fera que prouver la légitimité de notre combat ! » {n}L'appel résonne comme un ordre qui se faufile dans leurs cœurs. L'ignoble puanteur du sacrilège manque de me faire chanceler.{/n}

languages.text: "İsyana kalkışmayacağız ancak kötü niyetlilerin bizi kıyımdan geçirmesine de müsaade etmeyeceğiz. Kanun da İmparator da bizim tarafımızda!" {n}Genç bir kadın öne çıkıyor. İnce bir kılıcı andırırcasına zayıf ve çevik görünüyor.{/n} "Ölüm korkusuyla bizi yıldırmak istiyorlarsa bırakalım bizi öldürsünler. Yalnızca haklılığımızı kanıtlarlar!" {n}Kulaklarda çınlayan bu çağrı, kendini insanların yüreğine kazıyan bir emir. Hürmetsizliğin habis kokusu, ayaklarımı neredeyse yerden kesiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We will not commit rebellion, but we will not allow ourselves be slaughtered by villains, either. The law and the Emperor are on our side!" {n}A young woman steps forth, slender and supple like a rapier.{/n} "If they want to crush us with the fear of death, let them kill us: it will only prove our righteousness!" {n}The ringing call is a command, pressing itself into their hearts. The foul stench of sacrilege almost knocks me off my feet.{/n}
